title: Please help me select a good engineering college
content:
Ik this is not the apt subreddit to ask for college suggestions but I need all the help I can get.

My rank is 50k in KCET and I want to take up ECE. What are my best options?

comments.body: Well i would suggest you to join pes even i got 51k in kcet but managed to get ece in pes from today's counselling so i am officially a member of pes university from today

Congratulations on getting admitted in one of the best colleges in Bangalore. All the best for your future!

Unfortunately, I can't join PES as I've not written PESSAT or any other competitive exams other than kcet.
Give me your exact rank by Monday ill find the best colleges where you may get ECE
Can I DM you my rank?

50k CET rank, u may get ECE at -  
Cambridge, CMRU, Rajarajeshwari College of Engg
Hey could you help me out tooðŸ˜­??

Yeah sure!!! It's not much tho ðŸ˜… just use a KCET rank predictor... Pretty sure you've already done it tho I don't remember which I had used but can't seem to find it anymore if you need any other help just dm me
Bro is pes mandya aiml vs dsu harohalli aids , any idea??!
